Important Dates

  • Application Deadlines

  • Early application :

    January 31, 2018 : Application deadline

    February 15, 2018: Notification of decision

    February 23, 2018: Confirmation of participation

  • Regular application :

  • Research Program Dates

  • July 27, 2018: the 10-week summer program ends
